name: Do NOT Run Away
description:
Do NOT Run Away is a really short first person horror-adventure game where you escape The Town. It was made for the Untitled Game Jam #76. It's kinda my first project ever sooo.... it might not be that good lol.

Hope u enjoy!!

I fixed a bug that would cause the game to not be able to be completed, pls download newest build

*WORK IN PROGRESS*
